title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry the pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Whisk the eggs and mix with grated Parmesan.
Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture in a bowl.
Season with black pepper and serve.
